entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT IN EFFECT, Gatineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:13 AM EDT Saturday 28 May 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 18.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gatineau Airport 07:00 AM EDT Saturday 28 May 2016
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 18.8°C
Pressure: 101.8 kPa
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 79 %
Dewpoint: 15.1°C
Wind: N 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index:

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 31. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. High 31. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 28 May 2016
